storageLimitation.title: Xaddididda Kaydinta
storageLimitation.description: Ha kaydin xog shaqsiyeed oo aadan u baahnayn.

purposeLimitation.title: Xaddididda Ujeedka
purposeLimitation.description: Xogta shakhsiga ah waa in loo ururiyaa ujeedo gaar ah oo sharci ah.

dataAccuracy.title: Saxnaanta Xogta
dataAccuracy.description: Macluumaadka waa inuu ahaadaa mid sax ah, la cusboonaysiiyay, oo xaddidan si loo hubiyo saxnaanta.

lawfulness.title: Sharciyad
lawfulness.description: Xogta waa in lagu farsameeyaa si sharciga ah oo anshax leh iyadoo la ilaalinayo caddaaladda.

dataMinimization.title: Yareynta Xogta
dataMinimization.description: Xogta shakhsiga ah waa in ay noqotaa tii ugu yarayd ee loo baahnaa.

fairnessAccountability.title: Cadaalad iyo Mas’uuliyad
fairnessAccountability.description: Xogta shakhsiga ah waa in lagu qaadaa si caddaalad iyo mas’uuliyad leh iyadoo la raacayo mabaadi’da asturnaanta.

confidentialitySecurity.title: Qarsoodiga iyo Amniga
confidentialitySecurity.description: Hay’aduhu waa in ay ilaaliyaan xogta shaqsiyaadka, xuquuqdooda, oo ay hirgeliyaan tillaabooyin lagu sugo aaminaadda xogta.
